screen_desc: This is a screenshot of a mobile web browser that has navigated to the Northrop Grumman website. The page displays a privacy notice related to cookies, asking the user to either accept all cookies, adjust cookie settings, or reject all cookies. The privacy notice includes a link to learn more about cookie usage. The browser interface indicates that it is either 5:43 AM or PM, and there is network connectivity as indicated by the signal bars and Wi-Fi icon. The website itself has a search function and a menu accessible from the top-right corner.
action_think: The user has navigated to a website with a privacy notice, likely while looking for technology news. The cookie prompt is blocking the content, so the next step is to interact with the privacy notice to either accept or reject cookies, so the user can access the content on the site and proceed with their search for technology news.
action_plan: Tap 'Accept All Cookies' to proceed to the content on the site.
After accepting cookies, check the page for the latest technology news.
If needed, navigate to another part of the website or perform another search to find relevant news.
action_result: The execution of user request is stopped.
